name: The Day After (a space frog, Enemursenpai)
name_original: The Day After (a space frog, Enemursenpai)
description:
The Day After is a short narrative experience following the day of a young man after he attempted to take his own life. Explore a small home and learn about the boy's past before your Mom returns home from the store. What will you feel by the end of the story?

This game was developed over a week during a summer game jam.  Wyatt and Nathalie are junior developers who are just beginning their journey into the world of game development. Wyatt wrote all the code whilst Nathalie produced all art assets. The duo refers to their partnership as Two Careless Friend's, and this is our second release.

We're also looking for feedback and criticism, so leave a comment and let us know what you think!

Disclaimer: The following game contains mature themes of suicidal depression and substance abuse.
